name: Software Engineering Radio
description: The podcast for professional software developers. Covers all topics in software engineering including architecture, design patterns, testing, and career development.

name: AWS Podcast
description: Official AWS podcast featuring discussions on cloud architecture, best practices, new services, and customer success stories. Essential for staying current with AWS innovations.

name: This Agile Life
description: Deep discussions on Extreme Programming (XP), agile methodologies, and software craftsmanship. Features practitioners sharing real-world experiences with XP practices, pair programming, TDD, and agile transformation.
